title: Victorian typeface?
content:
I need a typeface that has a classy, historical Victorian feel - embellished without going over the top. I need to use it for signs and business cards, so legibility is important too. Any ideas?

 [‹ Signage design standards](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190630/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42656 "Go to previous forum topic") [altering pt size in all-caps credentials ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190630/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42843 "Go to next forum topic")
author: aurelie
